lines.gurmukhi: jwgy isMG blvMq bIr sB dust Kpwey [
lines.transliteration_english: jaagae singh balavanth beer sabh dhusatt khapaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Brave and stalwart Singhs awoke and obliterated all the enemies.

lines.gurmukhi: dIn muhMmd auT gieE ihMdk Tihrwey [
lines.transliteration_english: dheen muhanmadh outh gaeiou hindhak thehiraaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Muslim faith evaporated and Hindu's remained in scarcity.

lines.gurmukhi: qih klmw koie n pVH skY nhIN izkru Alwey [
lines.transliteration_english: thehi kalamaa koe n parra sakai nehee zikar alaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: There was nobody to recite the Muslim Verses nor there was talk of Allah, the Muslim God.

lines.gurmukhi: invwz drUd n Pwiqhw nh lMf ktwey [
lines.transliteration_english: nivaaz dharoodh n faathihaa neh landd kattaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: None called for Muslim prayer of Nimaz, or the benedictions of Darrod. Fatima was remembered not and none revelled in circumcision.

lines.gurmukhi: Xih rwh SrIAq myt kir muslm Brmwey [
lines.transliteration_english: yehi raah shareeath maett kar musalam bharamaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: This path of Shariyat (Muslim Divine Law) erased, Muslims were perplexed.

lines.gurmukhi: guru Pqy bulweI sBn kau sc Kyl rcwey [
lines.transliteration_english: gur fathae bulaaee sabhan ko sach khael rachaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: By applauding all and sundry, the Guru exhibited the operation of Truth,

lines.gurmukhi: inj sUry isMG virAwmVy bhu lwK jgwey [
lines.transliteration_english: nij soorae singh variaamarrae bahu laakh jagaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: And then he stimulated brave warrior Singhs in hundreds of thousands.

lines.gurmukhi: sB jb iqnhUM lUt kir qurkW cuix Kwey [
lines.transliteration_english: sabh jab thinehoon loott kar thurakaa(n) chun khaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: They picked all the cruel Turks in the world, and plundered and liquidated them.

lines.gurmukhi: iPr suK aupjwieE jgq mY sB duK ibsrwey [
lines.transliteration_english: fir sukh oupajaaeiou jagath mai sabh dhukh bisaraaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Thus there prevailed the universal serenity and disregard for the tribulations.

lines.gurmukhi: inj dohI iPrI goibMd kI Akwl jpwey [
lines.transliteration_english: nij dhohee firee gobindh kee akaal japaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Then circulated (Guru) Gobind's order to reflect upon the Timeless One.

lines.gurmukhi: iqh inrBau rwj kmwieAnu sc Adl clwey [
lines.transliteration_english: thih nirabho raaj kamaaeian sach adhal chalaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: The sovereignty of the Fearless predominated and justice was determined by the Truth.

lines.gurmukhi: ieh kiljug mY Avqwr Dwir siqjug vrqwey [
lines.transliteration_english: eih kalijug mai avathaar dhaar sathijug varathaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Thus incarnating in the Kal-age, he unfolded Satjug, the Golden Age of Truth.

lines.gurmukhi: sB qurk mlyC Kpwie kir sc bxq bnwey [
lines.transliteration_english: sabh thurak malaesh khapaae kar sach banath banaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Abolishing all the Turks and barbarians, he inspired fidelity.

lines.gurmukhi: qb skl jgq kau suK dIE duK mwir htwey [
lines.transliteration_english: thab sakal jagath ko sukh dheeou dhukh maar hattaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: The ailments were driven away from the entire world and blessings conferred.

lines.gurmukhi: ieauN hukm BieE krqwr kw sB duMd imtwey [
lines.transliteration_english: eio hukam bhaeiou karathaar kaa sabh dhundh mittaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Thus the Creator's order was enacted and all the contentions effaced.

lines.gurmukhi: qb shjy Drm pRgwisAw hir hir js gwey [
lines.transliteration_english: thab sehajae dharam pragaasiaa har har jas gaaeae |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Then consistently the righteousness manifested and the praises of Har were articulated.

lines.gurmukhi: vh pRgitE mrd AgMmVw virAwm iekylw [
lines.transliteration_english: veh pragattiou maradh aganmarraa variaam eikaelaa |a

Shabad OS A.translation: Hail! The Impervious Being was manifested and heralded as the one and only hero.

lines.gurmukhi: vwh vwh goibMd isMG Awpy guru cylw ]17]
lines.transliteration_english: vaah vaah gobindh singh aapae gur chaelaa | 17 |

Shabad OS A.translation: Hail, hail (Guru) Gobind Singh; He, Himself, is the Master and the Disciple too.
